name: Stalker_Melee.Dark_Melee
display_help: Dark Melee allows you to focus the powers of the Netherworld to defeat your foes. The draining effects of most of these powers can reduce the target's chance to hit. Like all Stalker primary attack powers, Dark Melee attacks can land a Critical Hit for double damage, if you are properly Hidden, or if the target is Slept or Held.

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Dark_Melee.Shadow_Punch
powers.display_help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a quick punch that deals minor damage. Shadow Punches cloud the target's vision, lowering their chance to hit for a short time. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: Only if hidden or target placated
20.00% chance for 62.11 negative energy damage on target
Only against held or sleeping targets when not hidden
7.00% chance for 46.71 negative energy damage on target
Only if hidden or target placated

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Dark_Melee.Smite
powers.display_help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a Smite that deals more damage than Shadow Punch, but has a longer recharge time. Smite clouds the target's vision, lowering their chance to hit for a short time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: Only if hidden or target placated
20.00% chance for 74.41 negative energy damage on target
Only against held or sleeping targets when not hidden
7.00% chance for 73.41 negative energy damage on target
Only if hidden or target placated

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Dark_Melee.Shadow_Maul
powers.display_help: You wrap your entire arms with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a series of blows that deal a lot of damage over a short period of time to multiple targets in front of you. These blows cloud your target's vision, lowering their chance to hit for a short time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 7 ft. radius 120° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 4 ticks of 11.25 smashing damage over 2s on target
4 ticks of 11.25 negative energy damage over 2s on target
4 ticks of 13.45 smashing damage over 2s on target
4 ticks of 13.45 negative energy damage over 2s on target
Only if hidden or target placated
10.00% chance for 107.61 negative energy damage on target after 2s delay
Only against held or sleeping targets when not hidden
7.00% chance for 89.99 negative energy damage on target after 2s delay
50.00% chance for 89.99 negative energy damage on target after 2s delay
Only if hidden or target placated

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Dark_Melee.Assassins_Eclipse
powers.display_help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior smashing and negative damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you waylay your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Dark_Melee.Build_Up
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

display_info: 80.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Dark_Melee.Placate
powers.display_help: Allows you to trick a foe to no longer attack you. A Successful Placate will also Hide you. This Hide is very brief, and offers no Defense bonus, but it will allow you to deliver a Critical Hit or an Assassins Blow. However, if you attack a Placated Foe, he will be able to attack you back. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 15000.00% stealth radius for 10s on self after 0.25s delay
38000.00% stealth radius for 10s on self after 0.25s delay

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Dark_Melee.Siphon_Life
powers.display_help: You tap the power of the Netherworld and create a life transferring conduit between a foe and yourself. This will transfer Hit Points from your enemy to yourself. Foes Siphoned in this manner have their chance to hit reduced. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Negative), Foe -To Hit, Self +HP

display_info: Only if hidden or target placated
20.00% chance for 121.34 negative energy damage on target
Only against held or sleeping targets when not hidden

Only if hidden or target placated

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Dark_Melee.Touch_of_Fear
powers.display_help: The Netherworld is one scary place, and with but a touch, you can give your enemy a glimpse into this dark world. This will cause them to helplessly tremble in Fear. Foes in this state of panic have their chance to hit reduced. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 30.00% chance for 1.0 terrorize for 10.43s on target

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Dark_Melee.Midnight_Grasp
powers.display_help: Mastery over the forces of the Netherworld allows you to create dark tentacles that can Immobilize a foe and continuously drain their life force as well as reducing their chance to hit. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit
